attributes.additional_details: If you make any changes in your life, ie: change your job or address and are on benefits the government will force you onto universal credit. You will be allowed to keep the first £199 you earn, any thing over this amount the government will take 64 pence per £1 . How can that encourage people to work.
attributes.background: Do away with this benefit, it claims to make single parent workers better off but in reality throws families into poverty.
